intro: Symbolanthus rubroviolaceus, commonly known as the red-violet starflower, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers that range in color from red to violet. It typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and thrives in tropical and subtropical climates. The leaves are simple, ovate, and often covered in fine hairs, contributing to its distinctive appearance.
